the-ultimate-guide-static-websites-harp-.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Static Websites with Harp & Jade

dynamic-duotone-svg-jade.headline: Dynamic duotone SVG images with feColorMatrix and Jade
dynamic-duotone-svg-jade.description: In this blog post I'm going to explain the idea behind the duotone effect, how to achieve it using SVGs and the much talked about feColorMatrix, and how to do and automate the matrix calculation. I'll also show how I've implemented an easy color matrix generator in my blog CMS.

modular-markup.headline: Rebuilding a Website with Modular Markup Components
modular-markup.description: In a small team, everyone should be able to contribute content to the website without having to worry about design or write complex HTML.

australia-travel-blog.headline: Australia Travel Blog
australia-travel-blog.description: My travel diary from a month of exploring Australia, mainly Sydney, Melbourne and the countryside.

guide-everyday-life-minimalism.headline: A guide to everyday life minimalism
guide-everyday-life-minimalism.description: Minimalism is incredibly trendy right now and has been for a while. Its aesthetic interpretations flood Tumblr and Instagram and it's almost painful to look at.

switching-to-desktop-apps.headline: I switched from web apps to desktop apps and it's amazing
switching-to-desktop-apps.description: If you are, like me, very sensitive to small inconveniences and frustrations, good programs that do their job efficiently and look so nice that even seeing the little dock icon makes you happy, can have a huge impact on your life.

browser-extension-for-more-everyday-life.headline: The browser extension for more everyday life badassery
browser-extension-for-more-everyday-life.description: When my friend Jowa asked me to help her build the new website for her project Scheidé Revoltée, I knew this would be right up my alley. Their mission: celebrating equality, fighting outdated gender stereotypes and making a difference by empowering girls all over the world to be badass in their everyday life, one step at a time.

the-ultimate-guide-static-websites-jekyl.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Static Websites with Jekyll
the-ultimate-guide-static-websites-jekyl.description: Most personal blogs don't actually need a heavyweight content management system like WordPress. It's funny to call WordPress a "heavyweight CMS" when it used to be the only decent CMS that wasn't a bulky monster.

i-fell-for-self-help-so-you-dont-have-to.headline: I fell for self-help so you don't have to
i-fell-for-self-help-so-you-dont-have-to.description: I hate to admit it, but during my late teenage years and the beginning of my adult life, I massively fell for self-help blogs.

5-things-i-learned-from-working-in-print.headline: 5 things I learned from working in print
5-things-i-learned-from-working-in-print.description: For four years, I worked for a popular print magazine, developing marketing strategies, selling advertising space and coordinating partnerships.

developing-displacy.headline: displaCy: Dependency parse tree visualization with CSS
developing-displacy.description: My latest project started out as web development job but quickly turned into something much bigger: displaCy, a visualiser for dependency parse trees (grammatical structure) using the spaCy API.

farin-urlaub-interview.headline: Farin Urlaub Interview
farin-urlaub-interview.description: Earlier this summer, I interviewed Farin Urlaub (funnily enough, one of my early teenage idols), for Exberliner.

deichkind-interview.headline: Deichkind Interview
deichkind-interview.description: Earlier this year, Walter and I met Deichkind for Exberliner and we talked about career ambitions, getting older, the digital generation and German music fans.

new-york-travel-guide.headline: New York City Travel Guide
new-york-travel-guide.description: New York, die Liste der romantischen Stereotypen und Erwartungen ist endlos. Nach knapp eineinhalb Monaten und einem mehr oder weniger normalen Alltag in New York bin ich zurück in Berlin und habe ein paar meiner Erfahrungen zusammengefasst.

new-york-travel-blog.headline: New York City Travel Blog
new-york-travel-blog.description: In early 2015, I left my job and got on a flight to New York City. This is my diary about a month and a half in New York.

die-zukunft-ist-da.headline: Die Zukunft ist da: Über die Arbeit und den Neustart
die-zukunft-ist-da.description: In den letzten Monaten habe ich einen entscheidenden Schritt gemacht und einen Neustart gewagt.

hipster-shop-concept-generator.headline: The Hipster Business Shop Concept Generator
hipster-shop-concept-generator.description: Berlin is full of concept stores selling the weirdest combinations of random products and trying their best to be as quaint as possible.

who-the-fk-is-helene-fischer.headline: Who the f**k is Helene Fischer?
who-the-fk-is-helene-fischer.description: For Exberliner I tried to explain the weirdness, embarrassments and curiosities of German music. Especially one phenomenon: Helene Fischer.

gay-men-reading-german-cosmopolitan.headline: Gay Men Reading German Cosmopolitan
gay-men-reading-german-cosmopolitan.description: Ein kleines Spaßprojekt über die Absurditäten deutscher Frauenmagazine – gelesen von schwulen Männern.

ich-bin-dagegen-aber.headline: Generation Y und das tägliche Unbehagen: Ich bin dagegen, aber...
ich-bin-dagegen-aber.description: "Was immer bleibt, ist dieses Gefühl: Scheiße, du müsstest doch eigentlich was machen!" schreibt Tino Hanekamp.

schlandmania.headline: Schlandmania
schlandmania.description: Seit 2006 ist es gang und gäbe, wieder Flagge zu zeigen. Sie wehen an Autos und Häusern, zieren die Gesichter der Fanmeilen-Besucher und Prominenten (wenn auch nicht immer gekonnt) und bestimmen wochenlang das Stadtbild jeder Klein und Großstadt.

the-early-years.headline: Best of analog 2008-2012
the-early-years.description: A collection of disposable camera memories between 2008 and 2012, between Cologne and Berlin, with visits several other places.

christiane-f-interview.headline: Christiane F. Interview
christiane-f-interview.description: For Exberliner, Christiane Felscherinow answered Walter's and my questions.

tocotronic-interview.headline: Tocotronic Interview
tocotronic-interview.description: For the January issue of Exberliner I met Dirk von Lowtzow and Jan Müller of Tocotronic for an interview in the Whiskey Room of Michelberger Hotel.

adam-ficek-interview.headline: Adam Ficek (Babyshambles) Interview
adam-ficek-interview.description: This post is part of a series of music interviews I did back when I was running an indie music website and going to gigs almost every other day.

holy-fuck-interview.headline: Holy Fuck Interview
holy-fuck-interview.description: This post is part of a series of music interviews I did back when I was running an indie music website and going to gigs almost every other day.

the-indelicates-interview.headline: The Indelicates Interview
the-indelicates-interview.description: This post is part of a series of music interviews I did back when I was running an indie music website and going to gigs almost every other day.
